synopsis.text:
Restaurant Kaidan, nestled in the eerie town of Yamazakura, serves up a unique menu of chilling tales. The restaurant's ghostly maitre d' sets the stage for three spine-tingling stories in each episode, each one a different course in this thrilling feast.

New to town, Shou joins Ako, affectionately known as Anko, and their friend Reiko in their sixth-grade class at Yamazakura Elementary. Shou's fascination with the paranormal is put to the test as the trio encounters an array of supernatural occurrences, from the peculiar behavior of a bullied classmate to a haunting vacation in the countryside.

The first two stories, or 'courses,' center around Ako and her friends, unraveling the mysterious happenings in their lives. The third and final course serves up a standalone ghost story, narrated by the brave trio, ensuring a diverse and thrilling dining experience.

Despite the chilling nature of these tales, the restaurant caters to all tastes, adjusting the spices to accommodate those less keen on horror. Join Shou, Ako, and Reiko as they navigate the spooky side of life, armed with curiosity and unyielding camaraderie. Delve into the eerie world of Restaurant Kaidan, where every dish tells a tale.
